How do I test?¶

All information in this document http://ihook.xyz/ It can be tested online..

Online iot dashboard for http://CloudEngine.com Please visit.

Iot Dashboard Nedir?¶

Banana Pi, NanoPC, Intel Edison, Parallella, Raspberry Pi with Python / Django REST framework working on single-card computers such as Improved Web Api service. GET, POST, PUT and DELETE through Web Api by contacting IoT devices It is designed to be able to perform operations easily. IoT: Platform for Internet of Things CloudEngine.com

What?

CloudEngine is a web service network project that transfers data between internet connected objects (iot). CloudEngine with Arduino, Raspberry Pi, Android, iOS, Windows Phone, Web Site, Banana Pi, Orange Pi, Beaglebone, ARM, Pic, Windows, Mac OS X, ve Linux based systems.

Why CloudEngine?¶

  • You can create unlimited channels,
  • You can add unlimited elements,
  • You can easily send data with all your devices (post),
  • Easily receive data from all iot devices (get),
  • You can track your data in real time,
  • Create real-time graphs for your data,

CloudEngine allows you to transfer data between all your devices easily Supports communication protocols.

Google developer chart integrated real-time monitoring of data
